changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Ce plugin permet de controller et d'avoi: This plugin allows you to control and have all the info from your Porkfolio piggy bank
index.md.Afin d'utiliser le plugin, vous devez le: In order to use the plugin, you must download, install and activate it like any Jeedom plugin
index.md.Suite à cela il vous faudra renseigner v: Following this, you will need to enter your login details (wink account + api
index.md.Rendez vous dans le menu Plugins\/Financ: Go to the Plugins / Finances menu, you will find the porkfolio plugin
index.md.Vous arriverez sur la page qui listera v: You will arrive on the page which will list your equipment (you can have several Porkfolio) and which will allow you to create some
index.md.Vous arriverez ensuite sur la page de co: You will then arrive on the configuration page of your porkfolio
index.md.Sur cette page vous trouverez plusieurs: On this page you will find several sections
index.md.Vous trouverez dans cette section toutes: In this section you will find all jeedom configurations
index.md.A savoir le nom de votre équippement, l': Namely the name of your equipment, the object with which you want to associate it, the category (preferably multimedia), if you want the equipment to be active or not, and finally if you want it to be visible on the dashboard
index.md.Cette section est utile si et seulement: This section is useful if and only if you have several porkfolio
index.md.Il faudra rentrer le numéro de l'équippe: You will need to enter the equipment number (1, 2 or 3 for example
index.md.Vous pouvez laisser ce champ vide si vou: You can leave this field empty if you have only one porkfolio which will surely be your case
index.md.Vous n'avez rien à faire dans cette sect: You have nothing to do in this section
index.md.bouton permettant de rafraîchir le widge: button to refresh the widget if necessary
index.md.Date de la dernière fois où un mouvement: Date of the last time a movement was detected
index.md.Date de la dernière fois où le porkfolio: Date of the last time the porkfolio was returned
index.md.Tête du cochon qui peut changer d'humeur: Pig's head which can change mood
index.md.En laissant la souris sur sa tête il vou: By leaving the mouse on his head he will tell you when he last moved as well as when he was last turned over
index.md.Bouton rafraîchir pour redemander les va: Refresh button to request values from the server
index.md.En laissant la souris dessus vous aurez: By leaving the mouse on it you will have the date of the last operation
index.md.Barre de progression dans l'atteinte de: Progress bar in achieving your goal
index.md.Plusieurs actions sont accessibles sur l: Several actions are available on the dashboard
index.md.En cliquant sur le billet vous pourrez d: By clicking on the ticket you can deposit or withdraw a sum of money
index.md.En cliquant sur le drapeau vous pourrez: By clicking on the flag you can change your goal
index.md.En cliquant sur le pinceau vous pourrez: By clicking on the brush you can change the color of the nose of your porkfolio
index.md.Le système recupère les informations tou: The system retrieves information every hour
index.md.Vous pouvez cliquer sur la commande Rafr: You can click the Refresh command to refresh manually
index.md.Assurez-vous d'avoir créé le fichier de: Make sure you have created the config file by saving your info in the general config of the plugin
